welcome_message_body: Welcome to Guanajuato, a city known for its colorful streets, rich history, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy exploring its charming alleyways, delicious cuisine, and friendly atmosphere. Have a wonderful time discovering all that Guanajuato has to offer!

restaurants.name: Callejón del Beso
restaurants.description: Callejón del Beso is a mexican restaurant located in Guanajuato.

restaurants.name: La Clave Azul
restaurants.description: La Clave Azul is a gastropub located in Guanajuato.
restaurants.address: Callejón de Cantaritos 31 (Plaza de San Fernando), 36000 Guanajuato, Guanajuato

restaurants.name: Delica Mitsu
restaurants.description: Delica Mitsu is a japanese restaurant located in Guanajuato.
restaurants.address: Callejón de Cantaritos 37 (Plaza de San Fernando), 36000 Guanajuato, Guanajuato

restaurants.name: Sushi Balls
restaurants.description: Sushi Balls is a sushi restaurant located in Guanajuato.
restaurants.address: Plaza de Los Ángeles 70, 36000 Guanajuato, Guanajuato

restaurants.name: Gorditas "Las Güeras"
restaurants.description: Gorditas "Las Güeras" is a food truck located in Guanajuato.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Del Bajío International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
